Room.Name: Boran Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the nicer section of Phexton Village, on Boran Street.
Room.LongDescription: Clean shops and a village meeting hall are on the west side of Boran Street. This small village for large people is built on the side of a mountain, and is surrounded by sloping fields and gulleys. Some of the buildings on the west side of the street seem to cantilever over steep slopes.
